mapper.select: insert into boardpost(boardNumber, postTitle, postContent, nickname, postDate, postTime, lookupCount) values(#{boardNumber}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{nickname}, #{postDate}, #{postTime}, #{lookupCount})
select postContent from boardpost where nickname = #{nickname} and postTitle = #{postTitle}
update boardpost set postTitle = #{postTitle}, postContent = #{postContent} where postNumber = #{postNumber}
